body_content.explanation: abbreviation for pixels per inch: a measure of the detail shown in a computer image or on a computer screen:
examples: Monitors typically had a resolution of between 92 and 125 PPI.

body_content.explanation: abbreviation for payment protection insurance: a type of insurance that pays back a loan (= money that has been lent) if the person who borrowed money dies, becomes seriously ill, etc.:
examples: Thousands of people could have been missold PPI.
